assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Linc Pen & Plastics Limited manufactures and markets writing instruments and stationery products in India and internationally. The company offers gel, ball, retractable ball, and fountain pens; whiteboard, permanent board, and DVD/CD/OHP markers/hi-lighters; pencils; and files and folders under the Linc brand. It also imports, markets, and distributes Uniball products. Linc Pen & Plastics Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Rohit Deepak Jalan
companyOfficers.title: Director of Sales & Marketing and Whole-Time Director
